Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined out of all reviewer response activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined per case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined followed by additional SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of cases with SW-Reviewer Declined that eventually reach SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Average number of SW-Reviewer Declined per manuscript submission
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined' grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined in variants with prolonged reviewer selection phases
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that lead to SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined per SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined in first-round reviews versus revised manuscript reviews
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of consecutive SW-Reviewer Declined activities
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur before SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Declined to total reviewer invitation activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of cases with multiple SW-Reviewer Declined that eventually get SW-EIC Accept
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined per SW-AE Assign Reviewers instance
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined followed by Assign a Different Editor
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined in variants with successful final acceptance
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur after multiple reminder activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
